guild.description:
Dungeons and Dragons (DND) is a fantasy role-playing game set in an imaginary world based loosely on medieval myth. This Guild is for learning DND, providing advice, finding groups, or sharing art, videos, stories, and other DND related content! Related Guilds:
+TableTop
+Lfg
+DnDHomebrew
+dndmemes
+BattleMaps
guild.description_html:
Dungeons and Dragons (DND) is a fantasy role-playing game set in an imaginary world based loosely on medieval myth.

This Guild is for learning DND, providing advice, finding groups, or sharing art, videos, stories, and other DND related content!

Related Guilds:
+TableTop
+LFG
+DnDHomebrew
+dndmemes
+BattleMaps
guild.name: DnD

title: I have a small dnd bot, and its only command is roll. What other commands would be good for it?

body:
I run a few text campaigns through discord (using avrae)

Some other helpful ones would be saves and checks.  However, you would have to figure out how to do the proficiencies for bonuses.

Maybe a stats command that would output: Level, Proficiency bonus, To hit bonus?

If you can develope a database, or access one like Kobold fight club, you could call up monster stats, that may be useful?

Hope these help, I would check into Avrae for inspiration.

Happy hunting!
body_html:
I run a few text campaigns through discord (using avrae)

Some other helpful ones would be saves and checks. However, you would have to figure out how to do the proficiencies for bonuses.

Maybe a stats command that would output: Level, Proficiency bonus, To hit bonus?

If you can develope a database, or access one like Kobold fight club, you could call up monster stats, that may be useful?

Hope these help, I would check into Avrae for inspiration.

Happy hunting!

body:
im starting to regret the monster stats command, its so fuckin detailed xD

i like it tho, got me into a roll where i was just barreling along, churning out line after line, heres the end result (this isnt even the full embed, it stretches from the top to the bottom of my screen lmao): https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/664906427420246057/724056785853612034/Screen_Shot_2020-06-20_at_8.22.21_PM.png
